info.description: This is a AI Mastering API document. You can use the mastering feature of [AI Mastering](https://aimastering.com) through this API.
info.title: AI Mastering API

tags.name: mastering
tags.description: A mastering consists of input audio, mastering parameters, and output audio.

get.summary: Download an audio data by id.
Download an audio data by audio_download_token.
Get an audio download token by id.
Get an audio analysis by id.
Search external music and get name, url, thumbnails, etc.
Get a library audio by id.

parameters.name: is_public
parameters.description: Whether the library audio is public.

get.summary: Get a library audio analysis by id.

post.summary: Create a new library audio like.

parameters.name: bass_preservation
parameters.description: This parameter represents if the bass preservation is enabled.

parameters.name: mastering
parameters.description: This parameter represents if the mastering is enabled. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "default" or "custom".

parameters.name: preset
parameters.description: This parameter is effective only when the mode is "preset".

parameters.name: target_loudness
parameters.description: This parameter represents the target loudness of the output audio in dB. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom".

parameters.name: mastering_matching_level
parameters.description: This parameter represents the mastering reference matching level. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom" and the mastering is enabled.

parameters.name: mastering_reverb
parameters.description: This parameter represents if the mastering reverb is enabled. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom" and the mastering is enabled.

parameters.name: mastering_reverb_gain
parameters.description: This parameter represents the mastering reverb gain relative to the dry sound in dB. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom" and the mastering is "true" and the mastering_reverb is "true".

parameters.name: reference_audio_id
parameters.description: Reference audio id. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom" and the mastering is enabled.

parameters.name: low_cut_freq
parameters.description: This parameter represents the low cut freq  of the output audio in Hz. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom".

parameters.name: high_cut_freq
parameters.description: This parameter represents the target loudness of the output audio in Hz. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom".

parameters.name: sample_rate
parameters.description: This parameter represents the sample rate of the output audio in dB. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom".

parameters.name: bit_depth
parameters.description: This parameter represents the bit depth of the output audio in dB. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom".

parameters.name: output_format
parameters.description: This parameter represents the format of the output audio. This parameter is effective only when the mode is "custom".

parameters.name: for_preview
parameters.description: If this is true, the mastering is treated for preview purpose (ex. not purchasable, not publishable, short lifetime).

parameters.name: review_comment
parameters.description: This parameter represents the review comment.

parameters.name: review_score
parameters.description: This parameter represents the review score.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: This parameter represents the publishment service.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: This parameter represents if the access token of the publishment service API.

parameters.name: access_token_secret
parameters.description: This parameter represents the access token secret of the publishment service API. This parameter is effective only when the service is "twitter".

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: This parameter represents the publishment message.

parameters.name: product_token
parameters.description: This parameter represents the product token.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: This parameter represents the payment message.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: This parameter represents the card token. This parameter is effective only when the service is "stripe".

parameters.name: payer_id
parameters.description: This parameter represents the card token. This parameter is effective only when the service is "paypal".

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: This parameter represents the payment message.

parameters.name: stripe_plan_id
parameters.description: The Stripe plan id. This parameter is effective only when the service is "stripe".

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: This parameter represents the card token. This parameter is effective only when the service is "stripe".

put.summary: Cancel the subscription cancellation  by id.

parameters.name: agreed_terms_of_service
parameters.description: Whether you agreed terms of service.

get.summary: Download an video data by id.
Download an video data by video_download_token.
Get an video download token by id.

analysis.description: Audio analysis data. The schema changes frequently.
Audio analysis data. The schema changes frequently.
